replies.body:
I don't see a single Toph comment.
How is that even possible?????
Neither did Toph.
i admit the powers remind me of Toph but the design for some reason reminds me of Azula, so maybe Toph in the fire ark inspired this
Yo guys whats up

Nami, Malphite, Brand, Janna. Long ago, the four champions lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when Brand attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four champions, can save us, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. 100 years passed and my brother and I discovered a new avatar, an earthbender named Taliyah, and whilst her earthbending skills are great, she has a lot to learn before she is ready to save anyone. But I believe, Taliyah can save the world.
If anyone should be the Avatar, it's Udyr. Read his lore

Yes, the master of all four animals is definitely able to bend Earth, Water, Fire, and Air. Tigers, Bears, Turtles, and Phoenixes are definitely not animals, and are actually the four ancient Greek elements.
Avatar Udyr skin would be pretty epic haha
man I love avatar! I wish there were more seasons of it.
*master of all four elemental dragons
*cough *cough, Morde *cough
looks like shes gonna be a Toph champion to deal with {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Water, Earth, Fire, Air. Long ago, the four dragons lived in harmony, but everything changed when the fire dragon attacked. Only the jungler, master of all four dragons, can defeat it, but when the world needed him the most, he went AFK.
1. i like the fact that taliyahs backstory reveals more about other champs lore
When rock bender is countered by rock

oh yeah defenitely a support champ here, a passive that lets her get bcak to lane quickly along with her q passive, q for poke, w for engage or disengage, e for zone control and chasing enemies and complete utility ulti. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} i like it.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
You would think that Taliyah would counter {{champion:54}} seems as he is a rock :/ and she is an Stoneweaver.
Taliyah Weaver's Wall + Bard Magical Journey = Sick Ganks and fun plays

Worst passive I've ever seen and a terrible Ult with a huge cooldown. If the Ult had a short cooldown, worked smoothly and did damage it would be all good. Also the E is useless for the most part. This champ is almost as bad as Aurelian. These new champs just keep getting worse...
This champion hasn't even come out yet.. Im betting you saw that sentence "she won't bring major burst power to fights" and concluded she is shit.{{item:3070}}

i donot think so. always got people can find how to use it.
it look like runing fast. but why the game killing is first.
i beleved someone will make a new way to play game
Says the guy who'll probably end up in bronze and stay there after promos and really knows nothing about the game
spoken as if bronze is the only rank with bad players in it, "really knows nothing about the game" fyi everything below plat is bronze, including you
fyi I'm in Gold
Almost everyone struggles against Zed... and she looks really OP :/
I hope that one day we will see an Avatar like champion, air bender Earth bender, fire bender water bender......... throw them all in the 4 abilities.. would be op
{{champion:222}} SHE DAMN OP xD
omg yas
She looks fun. Gj Riot{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Taliyah seems to be pretty balanced. But her passive is kind of useless because she hardly gains any movement speed while rock surfing. I hope her passive scales with something like ap or movement speed.
would be perfect with yas her knockups will be a good combo with him and her slow also
where is her ability that allows her to control malphite
Is it possible to W yourself over walls like {{champion:115}}  satchel charge?
Lol is this the tumblr champion? Seems like a special snowflake to me
ok, so her ult looks like it creates a wall, which would be amazing for ganks so i don't know what y'all are on about
The picture at the top of the screen would make a better splash art. sorry it's just not cutting it with the new level of art displayed in League of Legends.
Can't wait to play here in Toph lane

Riot also complains about movement creep which prompts the removal boot enchantments
"Let's give the new champion two sources of increased movement speed (not including items) and an ult that dashes halfway across the map in seconds!"
Where is the logic in that?
global distance =/= movement creep. please.

Long ago the four nations lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when brand started to troll. Only the Udyr,master of all four elements could stop him, but when the game needed him most, he AFKED. 10 minutes past and Taliah and I found the new avatar, spirit guard udyr. Although his farming is great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to win any thing, but I believe, Spirit guard udyr can win the game.
There has got to be some sort of copyright issues here, couldn't get more avatar if you tried.
Try telling that to Smite Devs

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:13}} If she is as good as she sounds then I can't wait to try her out. I'd be all like - Hi, my name is kinevil and I'm from the earth bending tribe of New Z Land, the land of the long white cloud which comes from all my fellow stoner tribe. Want to get stoned then go stone some noobs together!?
